pageContext.claim: “It's a choice between a Trump boom and a Biden lockdown. He wants to lock it all down.”
pageContext.analysis: False. Biden has said he would consider a lockdown if recommended by scientists as a way to prevent a surge in the disease; he did not make any pledge to do so. He indicated often such a lockdown would be an extreme option he would have to consider with care, but he would be guided by science. Biden generally was a bigger advocate of mask mandates to help stem the spread of the coronavirus.
